channel.title: Adding stats to weapon?
channel.description:
How do you add stats to a custom item that has all +0
its bandos whip btw[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 07, 2009, 10:10:30 pm[/size][hr]How do you add stats to a custom item thats all +0
thanks

item.title: Adding stats to weapon?
item.dc:creator: @twinky12341 twinky12341
item.description:
@twinky12341 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:4, topic:293641”][quote author=twinky12341 link=topic=388537.msg2904512#msg2904512 date=1249713564]
you go in items.cfg go to edit>find>bandos_whip>the numbers on the side is what you edit to make better.
[/quote]
Hmm, you lack a small peice of info. HE WANTS TO ADD STATS, so thats prolly not in his files then if it has NO bonuses. So all you would do is go in item.cfg, go to the bottom, and make NEW stats for it.

sorry my fucking god you don’t have to be a dick about it. and sorry to hear about you uncle.[/quote]

Read full topic
